Fujitsu fi 7300 NX

If you are searching for a scanner to digitize documents that seamlessly integrate into your workplace, then Fujitsu fi 7300 NX is the one for you.

Functional

It is a flexible and intuitive scanner with many standalone capabilities that fit any working environment

Easy customize

It has an integrated 80-sheet duplexing ADF and can scan A4 documents at up to 60 ppm.

Modern & Creative

The scanner's big 4.3" color touchscreen makes simple operation more effortless, and it supports wired connections through USB 3.1 and wireless connections via 5 GHz Wi-Fi networks.

4.3” touch screen display

fujitsu is with you everywhere.

Software support is one of its most important features.

Smart Feature

Fujitsu's extensive app bundle lets you choose between host-based, network, or hostless operations. Simply connect the scanner to a PC using a USB for host-based scanning, then download and run the PaperStream Capture software from Fujitsu.A smart feature for a scanner that can scan at a speed of 60ppm, the Fujitsu Fi 7300 NX scanner is one of the few that allows it to send scans over the network at the fastest speeds possible.

Software Support

PaperStream NX Manager is a potent software tool that may be used to set independent use of the scanner, such as the ability to scan using mobile or online applications and save to networked servers, helping to manage the scanner within an office or company environment. The REST API is an interface for creating web applications to perform scanning functions. The Authentication API can be used to set up the user authentication function on the fi-7300NX to restrict access to scanning and saving capabilities. The Connector API can connect the scanner with existing business systems, such as OCR.

About product

We believe that Fujitsu fi 7300 NX is worth your investment because it has so much to offer. The Fujitsu fi-7300NX represents a breakthrough in document scanning, enabling businesses to realize considerable gains in productivity, cost reductions, and office space utilization. This scanner features versatile Wi-Fi, Ethernet, and USB connectivity and a sizable, user-friendly touchscreen.
